Description: Round-topped limestone stela of Nakhtinheret; eleven rows of Hieroglyphic text including the cartouches of Senusret III above a recess for a statue flanked by columns of Hieroglyphic text and representations of the deceased.
Curator's comments: stela from Abydos cenotaph of Inher-nakht, ANOC 43.2; ANOC 43.1 = EA EA 559. Translation: Lichtheim, Ancient Egyptian Autobiographies (OBO 84): p.121-122
Bibliographic references: Scott-Moncrieff 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 2. (pl.18)
